# Rafael Alves - Portfolio
> Tech Lead & Full Stack Developer

## About
Rafael Alves de Jesus is a Tech Lead at Luby Software, based in Ilhabela, SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil.
He specializes in React, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, and cloud architecture (AWS).
With 5+ years of experience in full-stack development, he builds scalable web and mobile applications.

## Current Role
Tech Lead at Luby Software (March 2025 - Present)
- Leading development teams in technical excellence and innovation
- Defining clean code standards and security practices
- Overseeing cloud deployments with AWS microservices
- Mentoring developers and collaborating on product strategy

## Skills
